I completed my MSc in Computer Science from the University of Calgary under the supervision of Dr. Usman R. Alim. I was as a member of Visualization and Graphics Group (VISAGG) at Graphics Jungle. I completed my BSc in Computer Science and Information Technology from the Islamic University of Technology. I also worked as a teaching assistant at U of C. Currently, I am working as a faculty member in Computer Science and Engineering at Ahasanullah University of Science and Technology. [Download CV]

Awards, Scholarships & Grants

  1. [Oct 2016] Workshop Grant, German Climate Computing Center (DKRZ).
  2. [Oct 2016] CPSC Travel Award, University of Calgary.
  3. [Sep 2015] Research Award (2nd year of MSc), University of Calgary.
  4. [Sep 2014] Research Award (1st year of MSc), University of Calgary.
  5. [Sep 2014] International Recruitment Graduate Award, University of Calgary.
  6. [Sep 2014] International Student Differential Fee Reimbursement Award,University of Calgary.
  7. [Jan 2008 - Oct 2011] OIC Undergraduate Student Scholarship, Islamic University of Technology.

Research

My interests include Data Visualization, Computer Graphics and Computer Vision. In my MSc research, I collaborated with the German Climate Computing Centre (DKRZ) and developed a technique called "Icosahedral Maps" for efficient multiresolution visualization of climate model, i.e. ICON (Icosahedral Nonhydrostatic) model. I have research experience in Image processing and Computer Vision. I worked on Noise Removal, Object Detection and OCR. Currently, I am involved in Deep Learnig based Computer Vision projects [see my curent projects].


Selected publications:

  1. Sultan K. M. A., Rupty L. K., Pranto N. I., Shuvo S. K. & Jubair M. I., "Cartoon-to-real: An Approach to Translate Cartoon to Realistic Images using GAN", ICIET 2018. [arXiv] [poster]

  2. Hoque O., Jubair M. I., Islam M. S., Akash A. & Paulson A., "Real Time Bangladeshi Sign Language Detection using Faster R-CNN" (Accepted), ICIET 2018. [arXiv] [video]

  3. Jubair M. I., “Icosahedral Maps for a Multiresolution Representation of Earth Data”, MSc thesis, Department of Computer Science, University of Calgary, 2016. [pdf] [slides]

  4. Jubair M. I., Alim U., Röber N., Clyne J. & Mahdavi-Amiri A., “Icosahedral Maps for a Multiresolution Representation of Earth Data”, VMV 2016. [paper]

  5. Jubair M. I., Alim U., Röber N., Clyne J., Mahdavi-Amiri A. & Samavati. F., “Multiresolution Visualization of Digital Earth Data via Hexagonal Box Spline Wavelets”, IEEE VIS 2015. [paper] [poster]

  6. Jubair M. I. & Banik P., “A Technique to Detect Books from Library Bookshelf Image”, IEEE ICCC 2013. [paper] [code]

  7. Jubair M. I., Rahman M. M., Ashfaqueuddin S. & Ziko I. M., “An enhanced decision based adaptive median filtering technique to remove Salt and Pepper noise in digital images”, ICCIT 2011. [paper]
